upperBoundMethods

Class AbstractUpperBoundEstimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • upperBoundMethods.AbstractUpperBoundEstimation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BermudanSwaptionValueEstimatorInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AndersenBroadieUpperBoundEstimation, DeltaHedgingUpperBound

    public abstract class AbstractUpperBoundEstimation
extends java.lang.Object
implements BermudanSwaptionValueEstimatorInterface
    This class provides the framework for an upper bound estimation based on an abstract estimation of a martingale process following the primal-dual approach. The abstract method calculateMartingaleApproximation needs to be implemented depending on the specific method.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Lennart Quante

    • Method Detail

      • getValueEstimation

        public net.finmath.stochastic.RandomVariable getValueEstimation(BermudanSwaption bermudanOption,
                                                                double evaluationTime,
                                                                net.finmath.montecarlo.interestrate.LIBORModelMonteCarloSimulationModel model,
                                                                net.finmath.stochastic.RandomVariable triggerValuesInput)
                                                         throws net.finmath.exception.CalculationException
        Description copied from interface: BermudanSwaptionValueEstimatorInterface
        Returns the value estimation of a given Bermudan option using a given LIBORMonteCarloModel and evaluation time. The definition of the valuation method is part of the object implementing this interface.
        Specified by:
        getValueEstimation in interface BermudanSwaptionValueEstimatorInterface
        Parameters:
        bermudanOption - Given Bermudan option.
        evaluationTime - The time on which the evaluation should be performed.
        model - The used LIBOR model.
        Returns:
        The value random variable of bermudanOption.
        Throws:
        net.finmath.exception.CalculationException
